title: Yummy, Yummy
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 53 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 120L
description: Who doesn't have food preferences? In this simple, repetitive text, readers find out what kinds of foods the boy in the story finds delicious. Each page introduces a different food and an affirmative response, "Yummy, yummy." The end of the story reveals a food that the boy doesn't find so yummy.
reviewWords: apples, bananas, carrots, cookies, corn on the cob, jam, lima beans, peas, pizza, popcorn, yucky, yummy
comprehension: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
wordWork:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
